Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: A-korosey Yallih Amri (Qhiyaamah Ayro kinnuk) yemeeteeh, xayyooweh, tokkel Nabii sin kah xagnise digaalat maasassakina, agleh kaat hayya haanamak Yalli saytunnooweeh fayya iyyek

Yalli malayka wacyi luk isi fayxiiy, isi amrih oobisa, isi naqoosak (ambiyaa kee farmoytit kinnuk) isih faxa maral, sinam Yallat agleyta haytaamak meesiisa iyyaanamah, diggah yok sa qibaada cakkisita Yalli mayanak yok meesita qibaada yoh caglisak iyye Yalli
Qaranwaa kee baaxo cakkil gine Rabbi agleh kaat hayya haanamak saytunnooweeh, fayya iyyeeh nabah
Yalli seehadaytu tiffoytak {daacoyta kinnuk} gine, tokkel usuk Yalli rabeh yan mara mugsa iyyaamal baxxaqqa iyya kaxxa giddi-li kinni
Yalli lac siinih gineeh, xabcak edde gamittan saray kay xagooruk (dagooruk) bicissaana edde litoonuuh, gersi tuxxiq kee cado kaak takmeenim edde liton
isin ama lacat carra kaa orbissan waqdii kee Saaku kaa dacrissan waqdi walle siinit culussa qaxmaqaane kaat liton

usuk (lac kinnuk) sin duyyek qilsiimiy sin nafsi gibdi taqabik sa yaafem duude waak yen xer (der) baaxô fanah siinih yakkuqeeh siinih beya, diggah sin Rabbiy tamah siinih abe usuk xuwawli (Allaaqal-li) nacrorli kinni
sinaamey sin Rabbi faariisiiy baakil kee okoli siinih gine edde feertaanaah bilqa siinih yakkemkeh, isin aaxige waytaanam (baaburaay, tayyaarooriiy, wohuk kalah tanim kinnuk) siinih gine-le

Massah yan gita (islaamaninnô diinih gita kinnuk) sin tirtoh baxxaqqa haam Yallal tan, tama gitittet cakkik daggaawa giti edde yan (yahuud kee nasaarâ gita kinnuk) sinaamey Yalli faxinnay iimaanâ fanah inkih tirri sin haak yen
